input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Vickerman 9' x 12" Mixed Country Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Ashland 5ft. Green Boxwood Coil Garland'
  - Name='Creative Co-Op Pinecones Garlands'
  - Name='Impact 4.5Ft Shimmering Green Lighted Peace Garland'
  - Name='Ashland 10ft. Leaf Garland String Lights'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9ft Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Greenery Pine Poinsettia Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Starflower Chain Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Heather & Berry Coil Garland'
  - Name='Haute Decor Caroline Artificial Porch Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Deluxe Belgium Pre-Lit Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Centerpiece Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Eucalyptus Coiled Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Eucalyptus Leaf Garland LED String Lights'
  - Name='Ashland Plumeria Coiled Garland'
  - Name='Haute Decor Snowfall Creek Pre-Lit Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9' Battery Operated Pre-Lit Garland with 50 Warm Lights'
  - Name='6 ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Cashmere Pine Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Puleo Flocked Spruce Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Fraser Grande Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 9' x 12" Mixed Country Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar 9 feet length and garland type, but lacks specifics on lighting and pine branch construction, described as mixed country foliage rather than pine.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Close in length and also a pre-lit faux pine garland, matching core function and construction well with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland 5ft. Green Boxwood Coil Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter length and uses boxwood rather than pine; coil shape differs from typical garland design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Creative Co-Op Pinecones Garlands
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes pinecones like the reference but lacks mention of pine greenery or lighting; format and features unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Impact 4.5Ft Shimmering Green Lighted Peace Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter garland with lighting but described as 'shimmering green' and themed peace garland, likely different foliage and decorative focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland 10ft. Leaf Garland String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar in length and string lights but described as 'leaf garland' which may not be pine-based; likely different texture and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 9ft Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Greenery Pine Poinsettia Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar length and pre-lit status; includes pine greenery; adds poinsettia and snow flocking which are decorative additions but closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Starflower Chain Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: No indication of pine, lighting, or typical garland structure; likely more ornamental and different type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Heather & Berry Coil Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Coil garland with heather and berries, differing core materials and shape from pine LED garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Caroline Artificial Porch Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Christmas tree, not a garland; fundamentally different product type and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Deluxe Belgium Pre-Lit Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland, likely similar in function but lacks specific pine branch description for exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Centerpiece Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Centerpiece suggests shorter length and different use; no lighting or pine mention.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Eucalyptus Coiled Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eucalyptus material and coil shape differ significantly from pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Eucalyptus Leaf Garland LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes LED lights, but eucalyptus leaves differ from pine, and construction likely different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Plumeria Coiled Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Plumeria foliage not related to pine; coil shape and style very different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Snowfall Creek Pre-Lit Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas garland, presumably pine or similar evergreen, close in function and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter length (6 ft) but pre-lit faux pine garland aligns fairly closely with product category and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9' Battery Operated Pre-Lit Garland with 50 Warm Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit battery operated, though fewer lights; likely similar construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and artificial but shorter length and unspecified foliage type decrease closeness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Cashmere Pine Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Faux cashmere pine garland very closely related to reference product, though lighting status not mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo Flocked Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar evergreen garland with flocking; spruce differs slightly from pine but overall similar style and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tree product, not a garland, so very different product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly aligns in length, pre-lit artificial garland from same brand; likely very close in features and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Fraser Grande Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and garland type, although Fraser Fir is a different pine variety; likely similar quality and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pine variety, likely closely matching product type and construction though decorative collection may imply some styling differences.
